name: Biker Scout Trooper
Lore: 'Scout troopers, or ''biker scouts'' as they are commonly called, are stormtrooper specialists. Given wide latitude to operate independently of Imperial control.',
Text: 'Adds 3 to power of any speeder bike he pilots. Power -1 while not at a forest, jungle or Endor site. Forfeit +2 aboard a speeder bike. Once during each of your deploy phases, may deploy a speeder bike to same site from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.',
